variants.Description in input context: G to S mutation at position 2019 of the coding sequence.
G to S mutation at position 2019 of the coding sequence.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Expression in rodent and human cell lines, Luria-Davis erythroid cultures

Material used.Description: Cells were grown in vitro for protein expression analysis.

Readout description.Conclusion: No significant difference in protein expression between WT and mutant variants.
Readout description.Result Description: No detectable change in protein function.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was assayed twice to ensure reproducibility.

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: Wild-type cDNA used as a control.

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: Vector or scrambled DNA used as controls.

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: No mention of validation controls in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: No mention of validation controls in the text.

Approved assay.Approved assay: LRRK2 mutations are commonly studied using such approaches.
